data.text:
――Ardan-san. Chiyono O-san. For making time in your busy schedule 
to accompany me, I'm truly thankful.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>――Ardan-san. Chiyono O-san. For making time in your busy schedule 
<story>to accompany me, I'm truly thankful.

data.text:
No. I'm the one that should be thankful, 
I'm honored that you would ask me. Yaeno-san, 
I'll assist you to the best of my abilities.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>No. I'm the one that should be thankful, 
<story>I'm honored that you would ask me. Yaeno-san, 
<story>I'll assist you to the best of my abilities.

data.text:
Me too! It'll give me the chance to study Yaeno-san's training 
results from up close!
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Me too! It'll give me the chance to study Yaeno-san's training 
<story>results from up close!

data.text:
With the goal of [The Fusion of Fire and Water] during a race, 
we had begun special training to master tactics.
data.processed:
<story>With the goal of [The Fusion of Fire and Water] during a race, 
<story>we had begun special training to master tactics.

data.text:
Today is the day we test the results of that training, 
with Mejiro Ardan and Sakura Chiyono O, who are aiming to debut at the 
same time. I had requested parallel running!
data.processed:
<story>Today is the day we test the results of that training, 
<story>with Mejiro Ardan and Sakura Chiyono O, who are aiming to debut at the 
<story>same time. I had requested parallel running!

data.text:
For your thorough guidance up until now, you have my heartfelt gratitude. 
All that's left is the race itself―― the results of my 
training, I will confirm them myself!
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>For your thorough guidance up until now, you have my heartfelt gratitude. 
<story>All that's left is the race itself―― the results of my 
<story>training, I will confirm them myself!

data.text:
Haa, haa, haa―― 
Fuu……！！
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Haa, haa, haa―― 
<story>Fuu……！！

data.text:
During the middle stage of the race. Sakura Chiyono O was taking 
a leading position, up until now this would have normally 
disrupted Yaeno's pace, however……
data.processed:
<story>During the middle stage of the race. Sakura Chiyono O was taking 
<story>a leading position, up until now this would have normally 
<story>disrupted Yaeno's pace, however……

data.text: (……First. Be concious of your lap time.)
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>(……First. Be concious of your lap time.)

data.text:
(The speed and pace I need to maintain, I must engrave them in to my body…… 
Don't be led astray by others, I must persist！)
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>(The speed and pace I need to maintain, I must engrave them in to my body…… 
<story>Don't be led astray by others, I must persist！)

data.text:
Fuu…… fuu…… 
……――！
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Fuu…… fuu…… 
<story>……――！

data.text: Haaa……！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>Haaa……！

data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed: <story>……！！

data.text:
As they approached the corner, Mejiro Ardan moved in, 
aiming for a favorable position―― however, having calmly analyzed the situation, 
Yaeno Muteki responded superbly！
data.processed:
<story>As they approached the corner, Mejiro Ardan moved in, 
<story>aiming for a favorable position―― however, having calmly analyzed the situation, 
<story>Yaeno Muteki responded superbly！

data.text:
(First. Read your opponent. 
You must predict the race progression)
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>(First. Read your opponent. 
<story>You must predict the race progression)

data.text:
……As I thought, Ardan-san excels at technique. She has fully 
grasped her own weaknesses, therefore her tactics focus on 
precision, with the confidence to calmly execute――！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>……As I thought, Ardan-san excels at technique. She has fully 
<story>grasped her own weaknesses, therefore her tactics focus on 
<story>precision, with the confidence to calmly execute――！

data.text:
(Picture the opponent within your own mind, picture 
their run repeatedly, many times…… You must formulate 
a plan for certain victory)
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>(Picture the opponent within your own mind, picture 
<story>their run repeatedly, many times…… You must formulate 
<story>a plan for certain victory)

data.text: And then――！！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>And then――！！

data.text: ――Haaa！！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>――Haaa！！

data.text:
(Now let it burn！ Burn！ Let your spirit burn！ 
Just like a raging inferno！ Do not fear the Ardent Flame 
within, do not let it overwhelm you！)
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>(Now let it burn！ Burn！ Let your spirit burn！ 
<story>Just like a raging inferno！ Do not fear the Ardent Flame 
<story>within, do not let it overwhelm you！)

data.text:
(Do not yield the lead！！ Do not yield it to anyone！ 
The one who will be victorious―― will be me！！)
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>(Do not yield the lead！！ Do not yield it to anyone！ 
<story>The one who will be victorious―― will be me！！)

data.text: OoOOOOOOOOOOOo！！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>OoOOOOOOOOOOOo！！

data.text:
And with that, Yaeno Muteki magnificently―― 
crossed the goal first.
data.processed:
<story>And with that, Yaeno Muteki magnificently―― 
<story>crossed the goal first.

data.text: Haaa, haaa, haaa, haaa――
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>Haaa, haaa, haaa, haaa――

data.text: 『The Fusion of Fire and Water』…… right here, has been achieved！！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>『The Fusion of Fire and Water』…… right here, has been achieved！！

data.text: Yaeno-san―― that was wonderful.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed: <story>Yaeno-san―― that was wonderful.

data.text:
Ha！ ……I apologize. 
Before properly thanking you, I celebrated victory……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>Ha！ ……I apologize. 
<story>Before properly thanking you, I celebrated victory……

data.text:
No！ Really, the Yaeno-san just now…… was amazing！ 
More than I've seen up until now, how should 
I put it, you had the most spirit……！
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>No！ Really, the Yaeno-san just now…… was amazing！ 
<story>More than I've seen up until now, how should 
<story>I put it, you had the most spirit……！

data.text:
Yes. And also―― as an opponent from the same generation, 
it was an exceedingly intimidating feeling.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Yes. And also―― as an opponent from the same generation, 
<story>it was an exceedingly intimidating feeling.

data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>……！！

data.text:
Well then. ……Chiyono O-san, will you be free shortly after this？ 
……so that we won't lose to this awakened rival, 
we'll have to continue training.
data.name: Mejiro Ardan
data.processed:
<story>Well then. ……Chiyono O-san, will you be free shortly after this？ 
<story>……so that we won't lose to this awakened rival, 
<story>we'll have to continue training.

data.text:
Yeah, let's！！ 
……We won't lose next time, Yaeno-san！！
data.name: Sakura Chiyono O
data.processed:
<story>Yeah, let's！！ 
<story>……We won't lose next time, Yaeno-san！！

data.text:
……That's right. I can't lose either. In the Twinkle Series too, 
I will definitely be victorious……
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>……That's right. I can't lose either. In the Twinkle Series too, 
<story>I will definitely be victorious……

data.text: (And to do that――)
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

choices.text: Good work! That was a great run……！
choices.processed: <size=43>Good work! That was a great run……！</size>

data.processed: <story>(And to do that――)

data.text: ……Aah, you came at just the right moment.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>……Aah, you came at just the right moment.

data.text: Could I ask you to accompany me for a while longer？
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>Could I ask you to accompany me for a while longer？

data.text:
The place she brought me, was the place where we had first met. 
After turning towards me, Yaeno Muteki spoke――
data.processed:
<story>The place she brought me, was the place where we had first met. 
<story>After turning towards me, Yaeno Muteki spoke――

data.text: The Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu Kata, have you memorized them yet？
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>The Kongou Yaegaki Ryuu Kata, have you memorized them yet？

data.text:
If that's the case, please―― perform them together with me. 
Please accompany me.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>If that's the case, please―― perform them together with me. 
<story>Please accompany me.

data.text: ……――Alright, let's begin.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>……――Alright, let's begin.

data.text:
Confused by her sudden urging, I took my stance. 
And then……
data.processed:
<story>Confused by her sudden urging, I took my stance. 
<story>And then……

data.text: Haa！！ ……Seii！！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>Haa！！ ……Seii！！

data.text: Fuu！！ ……Tooou！！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>Fuu！！ ……Tooou！！

data.text:
I earnestly followed along, but I wasn't entirely sure if I 
performed them properly. While I was conscious of my posture, 
my movements were nowhere near as sharp as hers.
data.processed:
<story>I earnestly followed along, but I wasn't entirely sure if I 
<story>performed them properly. While I was conscious of my posture, 
<story>my movements were nowhere near as sharp as hers.

data.text:
But still―― while I was repeatedly taking my stance and 
progressing through, I felt a mysterious connection between us.
data.processed:
<story>But still―― while I was repeatedly taking my stance and 
<story>progressing through, I felt a mysterious connection between us.

data.text: Thank you very much！！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>Thank you very much！！

data.text: ……Um. ……Was I able to properly convery it？
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>……Um. ……Was I able to properly convery it？

data.text:
With each swing of my fist, and each movement 
of my body, I intended to pour everything into it. 
Everything I wanted to convey to you――
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>With each swing of my fist, and each movement 
<story>of my body, I intended to pour everything into it. 
<story>Everything I wanted to convey to you――

data.text: That I believe in you wholeheartedly.
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed: <story>That I believe in you wholeheartedly.

data.text:
Because of your guidance, I was able to arrive at the state of 
mind for 『The Fusion of Fire and Water』. Please, from now on, 
may I continue to receive guidance from you？
data.name: Yaeno Muteki
data.processed:
<story>Because of your guidance, I was able to arrive at the state of 
<story>mind for 『The Fusion of Fire and Water』. Please, from now on, 
<story>may I continue to receive guidance from you？

data.text:
Trainer-dono. As someone who is an expert in regards to racing, 
from now on―― by all means, please continue to instruct me！
data.name: Yaeno Muteki

choices.text: Yeah, I look forward to it!
Yeah, I look forward to it!

data.processed:
<story>Trainer-dono. As someone who is an expert in regards to racing, 
<story>from now on―― by all means, please continue to instruct me！

data.text:
And like this, I became the trainer 
responsible for Yaeno Muteki……！
data.processed:
<story>And like this, I became the trainer 
<story>responsible for Yaeno Muteki……！
